page.title: 15MEDIA
page.content:
TELEVISION 54 residents listed the four TV channels in order of preference. BBC1 BBC2 ITV CH4 FIRST PREFERENCE 36 11 6 1 SECOND PREFERENCE 14 23 14 2 THIRD PREFERENCE 4 19 17 12 FOURTH PREFERENCE 0 1 15 34
NEWSPAPERS-DAILIES Telegraph 17 Express 5 Times 10 Star 4 Mail 9 Mirror 3 Western Daily 7 Financial T 2 Sun 7 Guardian 2 (NB some read two papers)
Sunday Times is the leading Sunday Paper followed by the Observer. This pattern of upmarket viewing and reading presumable links with{Social {Class.
